amendment.description: Amendment adds language to clarify the use of delivery bonds by the Department of Homeland Security.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 1 printed in House Report 109-4 to promote the goal of 100% repatriation of all aliens ordered deported by clarifying obligations under the Department of Homeland Security's existing delivery bond authority.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Sessions amendment (A001) Agreed to by voice vote.
